title: Analysis of Thermophysical Properties of Deep Eutectic Solvents by Data Integration
abstract: Experimental data on thermophysical properties of solvent mixtures such as aqueous deep eutectic solvents (DES) are scattered in scientific publications. It is desirable to integrate thermophysical...
